name: Wooloo
description: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
abilities.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
